#Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

#Data
```{r}
Impacts_data <- read.csv("./dashboard/input/maatschappelijke_draagkracht/F14_3_data.csv",
                         sep = ",",
                         header = TRUE)

```

#Plot Stakeholders
```{r}
stakeholders <- c('Jagers', 'Landbouwers', 'Natuurvereniging')

Impacts_stakeholders <- Impacts_data %>%
  filter(Sector %in% stakeholders)

Impacts_stakeholders$Antwoord <- factor(Impacts_stakeholders$Antwoord , 
                                    levels = c('Geen idee', 'Zeer groot', 'Groot',
                                               'Klein', 'Zeer klein', 'Onbestaand'))

plot_Impacts_stakeholders <- ggplot(data = Impacts_stakeholders,
                           aes(x = percentage,
                               y = Question_label,
                               fill = Antwoord)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", 
           position = "stack") +
  facet_grid( ~ Sector)

plot_Impacts_stakeholders
```
